snippet: A teacher’s aide at a highly regarded public elementary school on the Upper West Side was arrested on Friday, making him the second aide to be arrested on sexual abuse charges this week.
abstract: Gregory Atkins, a teacher's aide at Public School 87 on Manhattan's Upper West Side, is arrested following an accusation that he had sexually abused a student; Atkins was also investigated for inappropriate behavior with a student at another Manhattan school in 2006, but no disciplinary charges were filed.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and ANDY NEWMAN
byline.contributor: Dmitry Kiper, Daniel Krieger and Anna M. Phillips contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A teacher’s aide at a highly regarded public elementary school on the Upper West Side was arrested on Friday, making him the second aide to be arrested on sexual abuse charges this week.
